title: Apple Pie
ingredients: Crust: 2½ cups flour, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 tsp salt, 1 cup cold butter cubed, ½ cup ice water Filling: 3 lbs mixed apples, ¾ cup sugar, 2 tbsp flour, 1 tsp cinnamon, ¼ tsp nutmeg, 2 tbsp butter 1 egg + 1 tbsp water for egg wash

title: Baby Back Ribs
ingredients: 2 racks baby back ribs (about 4 lbs) 3 tbsp brown sugar 2 tbsp paprika 1 tbsp chili powder 1 tbsp garlic powder

title: Baked Beans
ingredients: 1 lb dried navy beans, soaked overnight 8 oz salt pork or bacon, diced 1 onion, diced ½ cup molasses ¼ cup brown sugar

title: Baked Chicken Breast
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts 1 tbsp olive oil 2 tbsp butter 4 cloves garlic, smashed 4 sprigs fresh thyme

title: Baked Cod
ingredients: 4 cod fillets (6 oz each) 3 tbsp olive oil 3 tbsp butter, melted 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 lemon, zested and juiced

title: Baked Potato
ingredients: 4 large russet potatoes 2 tbsp vegetable oil Kosher salt Butter, sour cream, chives, bacon

title: Baked Ziti
ingredients: 1 lb ziti 1 lb Italian sausage 4 cloves garlic, minced 1 (28 oz) can crushed tomatoes 1 tsp oregano

title: Banana Bread
ingredients: 1 cup mashed very ripe bananas (about 3 medium) ¾ cup brown sugar, packed ⅓ cup vegetable oil 2 eggs 1 tsp vanilla extract

title: BBQ Sauce
ingredients: 1 cup ketchup ½ cup apple cider vinegar ¼ cup brown sugar 2 tbsp molasses 2 tbsp Worcestershire

title: Béchamel
ingredients: 2 tbsp butter 2 tbsp flour 2 cups whole milk, warmed ¼ tsp nutmeg Salt and white pepper

title: Beef and Broccoli
ingredients: 1 lb flank steak, sliced thin against grain 2 tbsp soy sauce, divided 1 tbsp cornstarch 1 tbsp Shaoxing wine 3 tbsp vegetable oil

title: Beef Barley Soup
ingredients: 1½ lbs beef chuck, cubed 2 tbsp vegetable oil 1 large onion, chopped 2 carrots, chopped 2 celery ribs, chopped

title: Beef Fajitas
ingredients: 1½ lbs skirt steak 3 tbsp vegetable oil, divided 3 tbsp lime juice 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 tsp cumin

title: Beef Stew
ingredients: 3 lbs beef chuck roast, cut into 1½" cubes ¼ cup flour, for dredging 3 tbsp olive oil 1 large onion, chopped 4 garlic cloves, minced

title: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 1½ lbs beef tenderloin or sirloin, sliced thin 3 tbsp butter 1 tbsp oil 1 lb mushrooms, sliced 1 large onion, sliced

title: Ground Beef Tacos
ingredients: 1½ lbs ground beef (80/20) 1 tbsp oil 1 small onion, minced 3 cloves garlic, minced 2 tbsp chili powder

title: Buttermilk Biscuits
ingredients: 2 cups flour 1 tbsp baking powder ¼ tsp baking soda 1 tbsp sugar 1 tsp salt

title: Biscuits and Gravy
ingredients: 1 lb breakfast sausage 3 tbsp flour 2½ cups whole milk ½ tsp black pepper Pinch cayenne

title: Blueberry Muffins
ingredients: 2 cups flour ¾ cup sugar 2 tsp baking powder ½ tsp salt ⅓ cup vegetable oil

title: Bolognese Sauce
ingredients: 2 tbsp butter 2 tbsp olive oil 1 onion, finely diced 2 carrots, finely diced 2 celery stalks, finely diced

title: Breakfast Burrito
ingredients: 8 eggs 4 large flour tortillas 6 slices bacon or ½ lb chorizo 1 cup cheddar, shredded 1 avocado, sliced

title: Breakfast Casserole
ingredients: 1 lb breakfast sausage 6 slices bread, cubed 2 cups cheddar, shredded 6 eggs 2 cups milk

title: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
ingredients: 2 tbsp unsalted butter 2 lbs broccoli, florets chopped, stems sliced thin 1 medium onion, chopped 2 cloves garlic, minced 1½ tsp dry mustard

title: Fudgy Brownies
ingredients: 10 tbsp butter (1¼ sticks) 1¼ cups sugar ¾ cup unsweetened cocoa powder ¼ tsp salt ½ tsp vanilla extract

title: Buffalo Wings
ingredients: 3 lbs chicken wings, split 1 tbsp baking powder 1 tsp salt 4 tbsp butter ½ cup Frank's RedHot

title: Cacio e Pepe
ingredients: 1 lb spaghetti or tonnarelli 6 oz Pecorino Romano, finely grated 2 tbsp freshly cracked black pepper Salt

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: 1 lb spaghetti 8 oz guanciale or pancetta, diced 4 egg yolks 2 whole eggs 1½ cups Pecorino Romano, grated

title: Carnitas
ingredients: 4 lbs boneless pork shoulder, cubed 1 cup water ½ cup vegetable oil 2 tsp salt 1 orange, juiced

title: Carrot Cake
ingredients: Cake: 2 cups flour, 2 tsp baking soda, 2 tsp cinnamon, 1 tsp salt, 1½ cups vegetable oil, 1½ cups sugar, 4 eggs, 3 cups finely grated carrots, 1 cup walnuts Frosting: 16 oz cream cheese, ½ cup butter, 4 cups powdered sugar, 2 tsp vanilla

title: New York Cheesecake
ingredients: Crust: 2 cups graham cracker crumbs, 6 tbsp butter melted, 2 tbsp sugar Filling: 32 oz cream cheese softened, 1 cup sugar, 1 tbsp vanilla, ¼ tsp salt, 4 eggs, ⅔ cup sour cream

title: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: 1 lb fettuccine 1 lb chicken breasts 2 tbsp olive oil 6 tbsp butter 2 cups heavy cream

title: Chicken Fried Rice
ingredients: 4 cups day-old white rice, cold 1 lb chicken breast, diced 3 tbsp vegetable oil 3 eggs, beaten 1 cup frozen peas and carrots

title: Chicken Marsala
ingredients: 4 chicken breasts ½ cup flour 4 tbsp butter 2 tbsp olive oil 8 oz cremini mushrooms, sliced

title: Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: 2 tbsp butter 1 medium onion, diced 3 carrots, sliced into half-moons 3 celery stalks, sliced 3 garlic cloves, minced

title: Chicken Parmesan
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts 1 cup all-purpose flour 2 eggs, beaten 1½ cups panko breadcrumbs ½ cup parmesan, grated

title: Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients: 1½ lbs boneless skinless chicken thighs 4 tbsp butter 1 onion, chopped 2 carrots, sliced 2 celery ribs, sliced

title: Chicken Salad
ingredients: 1½ lbs chicken breasts ½ cup mayonnaise 2 tbsp lemon juice 1 tsp Dijon mustard 2 celery ribs, chopped fine

title: Chicken Stir Fry
ingredients: 1½ lbs chicken breast, sliced thin 2 tbsp soy sauce 1 tbsp cornstarch 1 tbsp Shaoxing wine 3 tbsp vegetable oil

title: Chicken Stock
ingredients: 4-5 lbs chicken backs, wings, or carcasses 1 large onion, quartered 2 carrots, chunked 2 celery ribs, chunked 1 head garlic, halved

title: Chicken Tacos
ingredients: 2 lbs boneless skinless chicken thighs 2 tbsp vegetable oil 1 tbsp chili powder 1 tsp cumin 1 tsp garlic powder

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: 2 lbs chicken thighs 1 cup yogurt 2 tbsp lemon juice 2 tbsp garam masala, divided 1 tbsp cumin

title: Chicken Tortilla Soup
ingredients: 8 corn tortillas, cut into strips Vegetable oil for frying 1 onion, chopped 4 cloves garlic, minced 2 jalapeños, minced

title: Chili by George
ingredients: 2 lbs ground beef 46 oz tomato juice 29 oz tomato sauce 15 oz kidney beans, drained 15 oz pinto beans, drained

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: Cake: 2 cups flour, 2 cups sugar, ¾ cup cocoa powder, 2 tsp baking soda, 1 tsp salt, 1 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup buttermilk, 2 eggs, 1 cup hot coffee Frosting: 1 cup butter, 4 cups powdered sugar, ½ cup cocoa, ¼ cup heavy cream, 2 tsp vanilla

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: 1¾ cups all-purpose flour ½ tsp baking soda 14 tbsp butter (1¾ sticks) ½ cup granulated sugar ¾ cup dark brown sugar, packed

title: Cinnamon Rolls
ingredients: Dough: 1 cup warm milk, 2¼ tsp yeast, ¼ cup sugar, ⅓ cup butter softened, 1 egg, 3½ cups flour, 1 tsp salt Filling: ⅓ cup butter softened, ¾ cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp cinnamon Glaze: 4 oz cream cheese, ¼ cup butter, 1 cup powdered sugar, ½ tsp vanilla

title: Coleslaw
ingredients: 1 head green cabbage, shredded (8 cups) 2 carrots, shredded ¾ cup mayonnaise 2 tbsp sugar 2 tbsp apple cider vinegar

title: Southern Cornbread
ingredients: 1½ cups cornmeal (stone-ground if you can find it) ½ cup all-purpose flour 1 tbsp baking powder ½ tsp baking soda 1 tsp salt

title: Crab Cakes
ingredients: 1 lb lump crabmeat ¼ cup mayonnaise 1 egg yolk 1 tbsp Dijon mustard 1 tbsp Worcestershire

title: Dinner Rolls
ingredients: 1 cup warm milk 2¼ tsp active dry yeast ⅓ cup sugar ⅓ cup butter, softened 2 eggs

title: Eggs Benedict
ingredients: 4 English muffins, split and toasted 8 slices Canadian bacon 8 eggs 2 tbsp white vinegar Hollandaise: 3 egg yolks, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1 cup (2 sticks) butter, melted, pinch cayenne

title: Fish and Chips
ingredients: 1½ lbs cod or haddock 1½ cups flour, divided ½ cup cornstarch 1 tsp baking powder 1 cup cold beer

title: Fish Tacos
ingredients: 1½ lbs firm white fish (mahi, cod, tilapia) 2 tbsp vegetable oil 1 tbsp chili powder 1 tsp cumin 1 tsp garlic powder

title: French Onion Soup
ingredients: 4 tbsp unsalted butter 4 large yellow onions, thinly sliced 4 cloves garlic, smashed 2 bay leaves 4 sprigs fresh thyme

title: French Toast
ingredients: 8 slices thick brioche or challah 4 eggs 1 cup whole milk 2 tbsp sugar 1 tsp vanilla

title: Southern Fried Chicken
ingredients: 3-4 lbs chicken pieces (thighs, drumsticks, breasts) 2 cups buttermilk 2 tbsp kosher salt 1 tbsp paprika 1 tsp garlic powder

title: Glazed Ham
ingredients: 1 bone-in spiral-sliced ham (8-10 lbs) 1 cup brown sugar ¼ cup honey 2 tbsp Dijon mustard ¼ tsp cloves

title: Gravy
ingredients: 4 tbsp butter (or pan drippings) ¼ cup flour 3 cups chicken or turkey stock Pan drippings (optional) Fresh thyme

title: Green Bean Casserole
ingredients: 2 lbs fresh green beans, trimmed 8 oz cremini mushrooms, sliced 3 tbsp butter 3 tbsp flour 2 cups chicken broth

title: Guacamole
ingredients: 3 ripe avocados 1 lime, juiced ½ tsp salt ½ cup cilantro, chopped ¼ cup white onion, minced

title: Hash Browns
ingredients: 1½ lbs russet potatoes 3 tbsp butter or bacon fat Salt and pepper

title: Homemade Bread
ingredients: 3 cups all-purpose flour 1½ tsp salt ½ tsp instant yeast 1½ cups warm water

title: Lasagna
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef 1 lb Italian sausage 1 onion, diced 4 garlic cloves, minced 28 oz crushed tomatoes

title: Baked Mac & Cheese
ingredients: 1 lb elbow macaroni 4 tbsp butter ¼ cup all-purpose flour 3 cups whole milk 1 tsp Dijon mustard

title: Macaroni Salad
ingredients: 1 lb elbow macaroni ¾ cup mayonnaise 2 tbsp apple cider vinegar 1 tbsp Dijon mustard 2 celery ribs, diced

title: Marinara Sauce
ingredients: 28 oz whole San Marzano tomatoes 5 tbsp butter 1 medium onion, peeled and halved Salt to taste

title: Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: 4 lbs Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cut into 1" chunks 1½ sticks butter (12 tbsp) 1½ cups half-and-half (or 1 cup milk + ½ cup cream) 2 tsp salt, plus more for cooking water Black pepper to taste

title: Meatloaf
ingredients: 2 lbs ground beef (80/20) 1 small onion, grated (not diced) 3 garlic cloves, minced ¾ cup panko breadcrumbs ½ cup milk

title: Minestrone
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil 2 oz pancetta, diced 2 onions, diced 2 celery ribs, diced 1 carrot, diced

title: French Omelette
ingredients: 3 large eggs 1 tbsp butter Salt and pepper Optional: cheese, herbs, ham

title: Pan-Seared Salmon
ingredients: 4 salmon fillets (6 oz each, skin-on) 2 tbsp vegetable oil 2 tbsp butter 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 lemon, juiced

title: Pan-Seared Steak
ingredients: 2 ribeye or NY strip steaks (1-1.5 inches) 2 tbsp vegetable oil 3 tbsp butter 4 cloves garlic, smashed 4 sprigs thyme

title: Buttermilk Pancakes
ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour 2 tbsp sugar 1 tsp baking powder 1 tsp baking soda ½ tsp salt

title: Pasta Primavera
ingredients: 1 lb penne 2 tbsp olive oil 2 tbsp butter 1 zucchini, sliced 1 yellow squash, sliced

title: Peach Cobbler
ingredients: Filling: 3 lbs ripe peaches sliced, ½ cup sugar, 1 tbsp cornstarch, 1 tsp vanilla, ¼ tsp almond extract Topping: 1½ cups flour, ⅓ cup sugar + extra, 1½ tsp baking powder, ¼ tsp salt, 6 tbsp cold butter cubed, ½ cup heavy cream

title: Philly Cheesesteak
ingredients: 1½ lbs ribeye steak 2 tbsp vegetable oil 1 large onion, sliced thin 8 slices American cheese (or Cheez Whiz) 4 hoagie rolls

title: Pie Crust
ingredients: 2½ cups flour 1 tbsp sugar 1 tsp salt 1 cup (2 sticks) cold butter, cubed ½ cup ice water

title: Pizza Dough
ingredients: 3 cups bread flour 1 tbsp sugar 2¼ tsp instant yeast 1 tsp salt 1 cup warm water

title: Pan-Seared Pork Chops
ingredients: 4 bone-in pork chops (1-inch thick) 2 tbsp vegetable oil 3 tbsp butter 4 cloves garlic, smashed 4 sprigs fresh thyme

title: Pork Fried Rice
ingredients: 4 cups day-old white rice, cold ½ lb pork tenderloin or char siu, diced 3 tbsp vegetable oil 3 eggs, beaten 1 cup frozen peas

title: Roasted Pork Tenderloin
ingredients: 2 pork tenderloins (about 2 lbs) 2 tbsp olive oil 2 tsp sugar 1 tbsp fresh rosemary, minced 4 cloves garlic, minced

title: Pot Roast
ingredients: 1 boneless beef chuck roast (3-4 lbs) 2 tbsp vegetable oil 1 large onion, sliced 2 carrots, chunked 2 celery ribs, chunked

title: Potato Salad
ingredients: 3 lbs Yukon Gold potatoes 2 tbsp white vinegar ¾ cup mayonnaise 2 tbsp yellow mustard 3 celery ribs, diced

title: Loaded Baked Potato Soup
ingredients: 8 slices bacon, chopped 2½ lbs russet potatoes 1 medium onion, chopped 3 cloves garlic, minced 3 tbsp flour

title: Pound Cake
ingredients: 1 cup butter, softened 3 cups sugar 6 eggs 3 cups flour 1 cup sour cream

title: Pulled Pork
ingredients: 1 bone-in pork shoulder (6-8 lbs) 2 tbsp brown sugar 2 tbsp paprika 1 tbsp chili powder 1 tbsp cumin

title: Pumpkin Pie
ingredients: 1 (9-inch) pie crust, blind-baked 1 (15 oz) can pumpkin puree ¾ cup brown sugar 1 tsp cinnamon ½ tsp ginger

title: Quiche Lorraine
ingredients: 1 (9-inch) pie crust, blind-baked 6 slices bacon, chopped 1 cup Gruyère, shredded 4 eggs 1 cup heavy cream

title: Rice Pilaf
ingredients: 1½ cups long-grain white rice 2¼ cups chicken broth 2 tbsp butter 1 small onion, minced ½ tsp salt

title: Roast Chicken
ingredients: 1 whole chicken (3-4 lbs) Kosher salt Black pepper

title: Roasted Vegetables
ingredients: 2 lbs mixed vegetables (carrots, broccoli, cauliflower, Brussels sprouts) 3 tbsp olive oil 4 cloves garlic, minced 1 tsp fresh thyme or rosemary Salt and pepper

title: Salmon Patties
ingredients: 1 (14.75 oz) can salmon, drained ¼ cup onion, minced ¼ cup cornmeal 1 egg, beaten 3 tbsp flour

title: Fresh Salsa
ingredients: 1 lb ripe tomatoes, diced ¼ cup white onion, minced 1-2 jalapeños, seeded and minced ¼ cup cilantro, chopped 1 clove garlic, minced

title: Scrambled Eggs
ingredients: 6 eggs 3 tbsp butter, cubed 1 tbsp crème fraîche (or sour cream) Salt and pepper Fresh chives, chopped (optional)

title: Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: 2 lbs russet potatoes, cubed 6 tbsp butter, divided ½ cup heavy cream 1½ lbs ground beef 1 onion, diced

title: Shrimp Boil
ingredients: 3 lbs shell-on large shrimp 2 lbs small red potatoes 4 ears corn, halved 1 lb andouille sausage, sliced ½ cup Old Bay

title: Shrimp Scampi
ingredients: 1½ lbs shell-on jumbo shrimp 3 tbsp salt + 2 tbsp sugar (for brine) 2 tbsp olive oil 1 cup dry white wine 4 sprigs fresh thyme

title: Sloppy Joes
ingredients: 1½ lbs ground beef 1 tbsp oil 1 onion, diced fine 1 green bell pepper, diced fine 4 cloves garlic, minced

title: Smash Burgers
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef chuck (80/20) 8 slices American cheese 4 burger buns (potato buns work great) Kosher salt Black pepper

title: Spaghetti & Meatballs
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef (80/20) ½ lb ground pork ½ cup panko breadcrumbs ¼ cup milk 1 egg

title: Split Pea Soup
ingredients: 1 smoked ham hock 2 tbsp butter 2 onions, chopped 2 celery ribs, chopped 2 carrots, chopped

title: Stuffed Shells
ingredients: 1 (12 oz) box jumbo shells 1 lb ground beef 1 onion, chopped 1 (24 oz) jar marinara 32 oz ricotta

title: Stuffing
ingredients: 1 lb crusty bread, cubed and dried 6 tbsp butter 1 large onion, diced 3 celery ribs, diced 3 cloves garlic, minced

title: Sugar Cookies
ingredients: 1 cup butter softened 1 cup sugar 1 egg 2 tsp vanilla ½ tsp almond extract (optional)

title: Swedish Meatballs
ingredients: ½ cup milk ⅓ cup panko 1 lb ground beef ½ lb ground pork 1 egg

title: Roasted Tomato Soup
ingredients: 3 lbs Roma tomatoes, halved (or 2 cans whole San Marzano) 1 large onion, quartered 6 garlic cloves, peeled 3 tbsp olive oil 1 tsp salt

title: Tuna Noodle Casserole
ingredients: 12 oz egg noodles 4 tbsp butter 1 onion, chopped 8 oz mushrooms, sliced 2 celery ribs, chopped

title: Tuna Salad
ingredients: 2 (5 oz) cans tuna in olive oil, drained ¼ cup mayonnaise 1 tbsp Dijon mustard 1 celery rib, diced fine 2 tbsp red onion, minced

title: Vinaigrette
ingredients: 2 tbsp vinegar (red wine, balsamic, or sherry) 1 tsp Dijon mustard 1 small shallot, minced (optional) Salt and pepper 6 tbsp extra-virgin olive oil

title: Waffles
ingredients: 2 cups flour 2 tbsp sugar 1 tbsp baking powder ½ tsp salt 2 eggs, separated

title: White Chicken Chili
ingredients: 2 tbsp vegetable oil 1½ lbs boneless skinless chicken thighs 1 large onion, diced 4 cloves garlic, minced 2 jalapeños, seeded and minced
